title: Courier
description: A rugged courier who delivers messages across the wasteland

intro.text:
Hey, you! You're finally awake. Name's Pip, wasteland courier. Got a message for you from Vault-Tec.

Says you need to get your bearings. Good thing you're already wearing that jumpsuit - the wasteland ain't friendly to the unprepared. Now grab that sidearm and get moving.

quest_nodes.text: You still got things to do, wanderer. Check your inventory, grab that sidearm, tune into that radio. Don't die out there... I'd hate to have to deliver your obituary.
Well look at you, all geared up and ready for the wasteland. Good luck out there. Maybe I'll see you around... if you survive.

knowledge_nodes.text: The gear? Standard Vault-Tec issue. That jumpsuit you're wearing'll keep you warm, sidearm'll keep you alive. Don't waste the stimpaks on paper cuts.

fallback.text: Stay sharp, wanderer. The wasteland has a way of catching folks off guard.
